TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PasswordQuality extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of the , and members.
Docs.remarks:
Enumerates values returned by the following:
and taken as a parameter of the , and members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Admin.PasswordQuality Alphabetic = int32(262144)

summary.para: Constant for : the user must have entered a password containing at least alphabetic (or other symbol) characters. Note that quality constants are ordered so that higher values are more restrictive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Admin.PasswordQuality Alphanumeric = int32(327680)

summary.para: Constant for : the user must have entered a password containing at least both> numeric and alphabetic (or other symbol) characters. Note that quality constants are ordered so that higher values are more restrictive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Admin.PasswordQuality BiometricWeak = int32(32768)

summary.para: Constant for : the policy allows for low-security biometric recognition technology. This implies technologies that can recognize the identity of an individual to about a 3 digit PIN (false detection is less than 1 in 1,000). Note that quality constants are ordered so that higher values are more restrictive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Admin.PasswordQuality Complex = int32(393216)

summary.para: Constant for : the user must have entered a password containing at least a letter, a numerical digit and a special symbol, by default. With this password quality, passwords can be restricted to contain various sets of characters, like at least an uppercase letter, etc. These are specified using various methods, like . Note that quality constants are ordered so that higher values are more restrictive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Admin.PasswordQuality Numeric = int32(131072)

summary.para: Constant for : the user must have entered a password containing at least numeric characters. Note that quality constants are ordered so that higher values are more restrictive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Admin.PasswordQuality NumericComplex = int32(196608)
.field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Admin.PasswordQuality Something = int32(65536)

summary.para: Constant for : the policy requires some kind of password, but doesn't care what it is. Note that quality constants are ordered so that higher values are more restrictive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Admin.PasswordQuality Unspecified = int32(0)

summary.para: Constant for : the policy has no requirements for the password. Note that quality constants are ordered so that higher values are more restrictive.
